function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of indicators in global green building certification and rating systems to address pandemics","Impact":"Inability to improve residential buildings' pandemic requirements, leading to vulnerability to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Addition of indicators that consider pandemic resilience in green building concepts","Technologies":"Building design and technology that enhance indoor air quality and ventilation systems","People":"Residents, workers, students, and leisure users of residential buildings","Owner":"Developers, architects, and global green building certification and rating systems"},{"Description":"Limited consideration of certification and rating systems and focus on environmental and social sustainability only","Impact":"Inability to address pandemic-related issues in building codes and certifications","Mitigation":"Future work on improvements and new certifications that extensively consider pandemic issues","Technologies":"Incorporation of pandemic-specific design and infrastructure in building codes and certifications","People":"Future residents, workers, and users of new building developments","Owner":"Building code authorities, certification and rating system organizations"}]}
